name: Fern
headline: Input OpenAPI. Output SDKs and API documentation.
description:
APIs underpin the internet but are still painful to work with. They are often untyped, unstandardized, and out-of-sync across multiple sources of truth.

Fern enables businesses to instantly generate SDKs and Docs for their APIs.Inspired by internal tooling we saw at AWS and Palantir, we’re building Fern to let every engineering team offer easy-to-use and well-documented APIs.

Founded in 2022, we’re less than 20 people, building open source, and backed by YCombinator. We work together in our office in the Williamsburg neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. Our customers include Square, ElevenLabs, Pinecone, Webflow, and Intercom.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:open-source; industry:api; location:new-york

founders.name: Danny Sheridan, Founder
founders.description: Hey- I'm a co-founder and CEO at Fern. In my previous role at AWS, I saw how code generation for APIs saved engineering time and offered a best-in-class developer experience. I'm a people person who is happiest at work when collaborating in person or when hearing customer love first-hand.

founders.name: Deep Singhvi, Founder
founders.description: Deep is a YAML engineer at Fern. Before Fern, he worked as a software engineer at Palantir focusing on data integration at the Department of Defense and US Army.

## SDKs that are designed by language experts
Every generated SDK respects the idioms of the language, contains strong types, inlined docs, and intuitive error handling.

How SDK Generation Works
## Just run fern generate
Fern generates and publishes client libraries, so you can focus on building the API.
1
### Import your API spec
Start with OpenAPI, AsyncAPI, gRPC or our simpler format, the Fern Definition.
[Upload your spec for a customized demo](https://www.buildwithfern.com/</book-a-demo/upload-spec>)

### Add custom code

SDK Features
## Every feature you need, built-in
Fern SDKs support OAuth 2.0, server-sent events, auto-pagination and more.
### Automatic updates via CI/CD
Use the Fern CLI to generate SDKs as part of your release process.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55753654dc168aa6e939_CD.svg)
### OAuth 2.0
Handle OAuth 2.0 authentication seamlessly with automatic token management and refresh.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa5574b4e40d201ea8458b_OAuth%202.0.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67899bcbbe05a90987f5c28d_Name=Candid,%20Color=Grayscale.svg)](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/candidhealth/candid-node?tab=readme-ov-file#usage>)
### Server sent events
Stream real-time updates effortlessly with built-in SSE support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa557401731f1825122899_Server%20Sent%20Events.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67899bcbd6c419f0d1660ef5_Name=Cohere,%20Color=Grayscale.svg)](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/cohere-ai/cohere-typescript?tab=readme-ov-file#streaming>)
### Auto pagination
Automatically iterate through paginated data with built-in pagination helpers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55748fe4efee68669078_Auto%20pagination.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67899bccdadfc69b9ce8cebe_Name=Intercom,%20Color=Grayscale.svg)](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/intercom/intercom-node?tab=readme-ov-file#pagination>)
### Polymorphism (Unions)
Handle complex polymorphic data with native type safety in every language.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55747ee3b4ef04b4d5bd_Polymorphism%20\(Unions\).svg)
### Audiences
Filter your API definition to the endpoints and properties you want included in your SDK.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa5724dff2ce88855d8e7f_Audiences.svg)
### Multipart form uploads
Seamlessly handle multipart uploads with built-in utilities for streaming binary data and MIME types.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa57f9ee7791faa7dffdbb_Multipart%20form%20uploads%20\(1\).svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67899bcede3d27a7b2a8f6b9_Name=ElevenLabs,%20Color=Grayscale.svg)](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-js>)
### Retries with exponential backoff
Automatically retry failed requests and maximize the uptime of your API.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55759bef44be2217926d_Retries%20with%20exponential%20backoff.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67984bbd01443d2a241028d7_Company%20Logos.svg)](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/pinecone-io/pinecone-dotnet-client?tab=readme-ov-file#advanced>)
### Idempotency headers
Send idempotency headers to ensure safe retries for sensitive operations (e.g. sending payments).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa557466cd490c007a8a52_Idempotency%20headers.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/679af9dac91719e66b164ef3_Company%20Logos.svg)](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/square/square-go-sdk?tab=readme-ov-file#usage>)
### Code Snippets over API
Fetch SDK code samples from our API and embed them in your application.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55745c4fecf5f917fec8_Code%20Snippets.svg)
[Read the docs](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/buildwithfern.com/learn/cli-api/api-reference/snippets/get>)
### Dependency vulnerability scanning
Fern adheres to an SLA to detect and remediate vulnerable dependencies.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa58b7bdda719818632fa4_Dependency%20vulnerability%20scanning%20\(1\).svg)
We partnered with Fern for SDKs, and after seeing their docs platform, it was a no-brainer to expand.

SDK Features
## Every feature you need, built-in
Fern SDKs support OAuth 2.0, server-sent events, auto-pagination and more.
### Automatic updates via CI/CD
Use the Fern CLI to generate SDKs as part of your release process.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55753654dc168aa6e939_CD.svg)
### OAuth 2.0
Handle OAuth 2.0 authentication seamlessly with automatic token management and refresh.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa5574b4e40d201ea8458b_OAuth%202.0.svg)
![⟨76⟩](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/candidhealth/candid-node?tab=readme-ov-file#usage>)
### Server sent events
Stream real-time updates effortlessly with built-in SSE support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa557401731f1825122899_Server%20Sent%20Events.svg)
![⟨77⟩](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/cohere-ai/cohere-typescript?tab=readme-ov-file#streaming>)
### Auto pagination
Automatically iterate through paginated data with built-in pagination helpers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55748fe4efee68669078_Auto%20pagination.svg)
![⟨78⟩](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/intercom/intercom-node?tab=readme-ov-file#pagination>)
### Polymorphism (Unions)
Handle complex polymorphic data with native type safety in every language.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55747ee3b4ef04b4d5bd_Polymorphism%20\(Unions\).svg)
### Audiences
Filter your API definition to the endpoints and properties you want included in your SDK.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa5724dff2ce88855d8e7f_Audiences.svg)
### Multipart form uploads
Seamlessly handle multipart uploads with built-in utilities for streaming binary data and MIME types.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa57f9ee7791faa7dffdbb_Multipart%20form%20uploads%20\(1\).svg)
![⟨79⟩](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-js>)
### Retries with exponential backoff
Automatically retry failed requests and maximize the uptime of your API.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55759bef44be2217926d_Retries%20with%20exponential%20backoff.svg)
![⟨80⟩](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/pinecone-io/pinecone-dotnet-client?tab=readme-ov-file#advanced>)
### Idempotency headers
Send idempotency headers to ensure safe retries for sensitive operations (e.g. sending payments).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa557466cd490c007a8a52_Idempotency%20headers.svg)
![⟨81⟩](https://www.buildwithfern.com/<https:/github.com/square/square-go-sdk?tab=readme-ov-file#usage>)
### Code Snippets over API
Fetch SDK code samples from our API and embed them in your application.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/67aa55745c4fecf5f917fec8_Code%20Snippets.svg)

Use git to version and release changes to your documentation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67880ff570cdb1a85eee946f/678bf88386d0573e5886a2db_a0d453a947a6f78c7a3fd3855eebabc9_Docs%20as%20code.webp)

Preview changes to your documentation with a unique URL for each pull request.

generated_description:
Fern is a fresh player in the API world, established in 2022 and operating out of Brooklyn, NY. They’re on a mission to transform the often painful experience of working with APIs, which are notoriously untyped and unstandardized, into something far more manageable and efficient. Their goal? To streamline the process of generating SDKs and API documentation from OpenAPI specs to enhance developer usability.

The team at Fern, currently around 12 members strong and backed by Y Combinator, draws inspiration from internal tools used at tech giants like AWS and Palantir. They’re committed to empowering engineering teams to create user-friendly and well-documented APIs—because let’s face it; a poorly documented API is a developer’s worst nightmare.

Their offerings include SDKs in various languages (like TypeScript, Python, Go, Java, Ruby, etc.) and beautifully tailored API documentation. The process is straightforward: upload your API spec, select your preferred languages, and let Fern take care of the rest. This not only saves time but also ensures that the documentation matches your brand’s identity. 

Fern captures a solid clientele, which includes reputable companies such as Square, ElevenLabs, Pinecone, Webflow, and Intercom. This speaks volumes about the trust they’ve garnered in a short amount of time.

For those looking for high-quality developer tools that come with built-in features like OAuth 2.0, automatic pagination, and real-time updates, Fern provides an impressive suite. They’re keen on making the developer experience delightful by ensuring their SDKs are robust, language-native, and reflect best practices.

In summary, if you're an engineer tired of struggling with API documentation or plugging out poorly constructed SDKs, give Fern a look. They’re here to reshape how developers interact with APIs, one straightforward solution at a time. You can learn more about them at [buildwithfern.com](https://www.buildwithfern.com).
